CustomField.description: When we upload new contacts to Salesforce via Scout's CSV upload (for example friends+family or other UXR-sourced participants who aren't already "leads" or existing customers) then this checkbox value become checked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When we upload new contacts to Salesforce via Scout's CSV upload (for example friends+family or other UXR-sourced participants who aren't already "leads" or existing customers) then this checkbox value become checked.
CustomField.label: UXR Scout Uploaded
